attributes.action: support the campaign for Leeds to become the  British city of culture in 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britains cultural world is still exclusively focused on the city of London and i find the current situation unfair . The city of Leeds is a vibrant place to live which is rich in culture and heritage . Leeds is the best British city to visit outside London and it offers unrivalled visitor attractions and experiences for the young and mature . Help to create some more jobs for British workers here in the city of Leeds and sign this petition for Leeds to become the first British city of culture in the year 2011 .
